entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of drizzle beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
